objectives: Produce core color signs and combine with nouns
Describe clothing and objects with color + noun order

vocab.term: RED / BLUE / GREEN / YELLOW / BLACK / WHITE

vocab.def: Clothing nouns to pair with colors.

sections.heading: Color + Noun Order
sections.body: Use **COLOR + NOUN**: **RED SHIRT**, **BLUE HAT**. Keep descriptions 2â€“3 signs for clarity.

sections.heading: Describe an Object
sections.body: Add one adjective: **BIG RED BACKPACK**, **SMALL GREEN BOOK**. Avoid stacking too many at once.

sections.heading: Partner Drill
sections.body: A describes an item in the room using color and one adjective. B points to or identifies it.

sections.heading: Clothing Quickfire
sections.body: Sign what you wear today: **BLACK SHIRT, BLUE JEANS.**

items.q: Gloss two items you see (color + noun + one adjective).

items.prompt: Which colors or adjective shapes need practice?

reflectionPrompt: Record 20â€“30s describing 3 objects with color + noun + one adjective.
summary: You combined color + noun order, added one adjective, and practiced concise descriptions.
